On Monday 21 February 2005 18:47, Yagiz Erkan wrote:

> It may look like an overkill but you can use Hibernate's automatic
> schema generation capability to create the schema at startup. You
> don't have to use Hibernate for anything else. It will read the
> schema information from the XML files. If you're already familiar
> with Hibernate, it's not at all hard to do it.

Thanks for the suggestion, I'm not using Hibernate for this app, but 
I'll have a look at it for this particular purpose. Before that, I'll 
see if DbUnit can be extended to suit my need. It already supports 
DataSets that are read from another DB, maybe it can be persuaded, with 
the help of some code, to import the schema from a master DB.

Michael
